entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
